title: Simulation-Based Scientific Inquiry Program Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and foundational knowledge of experimental procedures
context.additional_context: For in-service elementary school teachers, focusing on enhancing scientific inquiry skills using smartphone-based simulation/VR learning environments in limited technological settings.

learning_goals: Accurately explain over 80% of science concepts through explicit response construction in simulation environments
Correctly formulate hypotheses and predict experimental outcomes at least twice out of three VR-based inquiry activities
Correctly reproduce over 90% of stages in the scientific inquiry process during post-program formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
